tool_description: Assigns team members to survey tasks based on expertise, equipment needs, and site requirements.

team_members.description: List of available team member IDs

survey_tasks.description: List of survey tasks to be completed

specializations_required.description: Required specializations: geologist, geophysicist, surveyor, driller

error_messages: Insufficient team size: Not enough team members for the planned tasks.
Missing specializations: Required expertise not available in team roster.
Invalid duration: Duration must be between 1 and 365 days.
Task assignment conflict: Some tasks cannot be performed simultaneously.
usage: Provide team roster, task list, duration, and required specializations to generate optimal team assignments.
